title: Fluent UI token JSON
description: A set of tokens for the Fluent UI token pipeline.

FluentUITokensVersion.description: The version of the Fluent UI token JSON spec this file adheres to.

ValueToken.title: Value token
ValueToken.description: A token with a discrete value.

anyOf.title: Token value
anyOf.description: See the documentation for what is allowed for each type of token.

anyOf.title: Token array value
anyOf.description: See the documentation for what is allowed for each type of token.

Alias.title: Alias
Alias.description: An alias token that gets its value from another token, or a reference to another token set.

aliasOf.title: Alias target
aliasOf.description: A name of another token or token set, separated by dots. (For example, the token name "Global.Color.Blue" would make this an alias token, or the token set name "Global.Color" would make this a set alias.)

start.description: The start point of the linear gradient as [x, y] where x and y are numbers 0-1.

end.description: The end point of the linear gradient as [x, y] where x and y are numbers 0-1.

stopsUnits.description: The units to use to interpret the stop positions. Leave off to specify relative units 0-1, or specify "pixels" to specify pixels from the start point of the gradient.

GradientStop.title: Gradient stop
GradientStop.description: A single stop in a gradient.

value.title: Gradient stop value
value.description: A color value for this gradient stop.

aliasOf.title: Gradient stop alias
aliasOf.description: The name of a color token that this gradient stop gets its color from. (Not a token set, or any type of token other than a solid color.)

GradientStopPosition.title: Gradient stop position
GradientStopPosition.description: The position of this gradient stop, typically 0-1. If stopsUnits is "pixels", then the position is instead a number of pixels from the start point of the gradient.

ComputedToken.title: Computed token
ComputedToken.description: A token with its value computed from another token's value.

OpacityComputation.title: Opacity computed token
OpacityComputation.description: A color token with its value computed by changing the opacity of another color token.

color.title: Base color token name
color.description: The name of the token to use as a base color.

opacity.title: Opacity
opacity.description: The new opacity to be applied to the base color, 0-1. The base color's opacity is ignored if present.

ColorTokenGeneration.title: Generated color tokens
ColorTokenGeneration.description: Instructions for generating a set of color tokens.

value.title: Base color
value.description: The base color from which to generate a set of colors.

TokenGenerationType.title: Token generation algorithm
TokenGenerationType.description: The color token generation algorithm to use for this set. See the documentation for details on what tokens each algorithm generates.

blur.title: Blur amount
blur.description: The shadow's blur amount, in pixels.

color.title: Color
color.description: The shadow's color (either as value or aliasOf).

PlatformOverrides.title: Platform overrides
PlatformOverrides.description:
One or more sets of overrides that each apply to a specific platform.

Note that use of platform overrides in complex situations, especially when used in multiple JSON files that are merged together, can produce JSON that cannot be validated by this schema, even though the pipeline can still process that JSON successfully.

NameOverride.title: Name override
NameOverride.description: A name override for export only. For example, "MyTokenNameForExport". Aliases will will refer to this token by its canonical name.
